name: Hearthstone Lounge
location: Disney's Grand Californian Hotel & Spa, Disney's Grand Californian Hotel & Spa

items.description: Meilleur Ouvrier Chartreuse, Empress Gin, Lime Juice, Simple Syrup

items.title: Hearthstone Old Fashioned
items.description: The Beverly Orange Wine Cask Finished Blended American Whiskey, Angostura Bitters, Luxardo Liqueur, Demerara Syrup, Luxardo Cherry, Orange Peel

items.description: Fever-Tree Sparkling Pink Grapefruit, Falernum, Lime Juice, Grapefruit Juice, Garnished with a Grapefruit Wheel

items.title: Crisp Spring
items.description: White Grape Juice, Premium Sparkling Water, Lemon Juice, Pomegranate Juice, Garnished with Mint Sprigs

items.title: Peach Meadows
items.description: Peach Juice, Sparkling Mineral Water, Sage Essence, Lemon Juice, Garnished with a Lemon Wedge

items.title: Orchard Swig
items.description: Apple Cider, Cinnamon, Orgeat, Ginger Beer, Garnished with a Cinnamon-Dusted Apple Slice and Luxardo Cherries

items.description: Pasture-raised Party Wings, Citrus-Habanero Hot Sauce, Maple Celery Root-Carrot Slaw

items.description: Seasoned Steak Fries, Chorizo Gravy, White Cheddar Curds, Sweet & Hot Peppers

items.description: Gem Lettuce, Freshly Grated Parmesan, Brown Butter & Sage Croutons, Caesar Dressing

items.title: Hearthstone Cobb Salad
items.description: Leaf Lettuce, Arugula, Cider-Glazed Bacon, Point Reyes Blue Cheese, Avocado, Cherry Tomatoes, Radishes, Soft-Boiled Egg, Artichoke, Red Onions, Creamy Apple Vinaigrette

items.title: Flaky Buttermilk-Battered Chicken Sandwich*
items.description: Pasture-raised Chicken, Soft-fried Egg, Cucumber & Radicchio Slaw, Habanero Aïoli & Hot Honey Drizzle, Buttered Brioche Bun, French Fries

items.description: Point Reyes Toma Cheese, Canadian Bacon, Tomato, Arugula, Choice of Seasonal Fruit or French Fries

items.title: Hearthstone Burger*
items.description: Sonoma Sharp White Cheddar, Avocado, Lettuce, Tomatoes, Bacon-Shallot Jam and Chimichurri Aïoli on a Buttered Brioche Bun, served with French Fries

items.description: Fresh Mozzarella, Fresh Basil, Fire-roasted Tomatoes, Artisan Cheese Blend

items.title: Forest Mushroom Impossible™ Sausage
items.description: Roasted Mushrooms, Plant-based Sausage, Mushroom Spread, Caramelized Onions, Green Onions, Fresh Mozzarella, Artisan Cheese Blend

items.description: Premium Pepperoni, Prosciutto, Italian Sausage, Arugula, Fire-roasted Tomatoes, Artisan Cheese Blend

items.description: Portobello “Steak,” Asparagus, Mushrooms, Shallots, Dairy-Free Parmesan, Garlic & Aromatics

items.description: Fingerling Potatoes, Broccolini, Aromatic Lemon Butter, Champagne-Truffle Vinaigrette

items.description: Fresh Elbow Macaroni, Black Truffle, Cheddar Cheese Sauce

items.description: Guanaja Cheesecake, Dark Chocolate Ganache, Chocolate Crunch Topping, Chocolate Deco Chip, Orange Sauce, Macerated Raspberries
